sentences.en: "That was a truly delicious piece of pork," he said. "Yes, wasn't it?" echoed Penelope.
sentences.cn: “那块猪肉真好吃，”他说。“没错，可不是么？”佩内洛普附和道。

sentences.en: Cook the beans with a piece of salt pork.
sentences.cn: 把豆子和一片咸猪肉一起煮.

sentences.en: I'll send Pork to Macon tomorrow to buy more seed.
sentences.cn: 我要打发波克明天到梅肯去再买一些种子.

sentences.en: If we can't afford beef, we have to do with pork.
sentences.cn: 如果我们买不起牛肉, 猪肉也行.

sentences.en: It's a kind of stew made with black beans, pork, and spices.
sentences.cn: 这是用黑豆, 猪肉和香料做的一种炖肉.

sentences.en: Legs of pork were cured and smoked over the fire.
Place the sliced pork fillet on top and pour a little sauce over it.
sentences.cn: 把切成片的猪肉里脊放在上面，再往上浇点调味汁。

sentences.en: Pork braised with dried vegetable is originally a homemade dish cooked by rural housewives.
sentences.cn: 干菜焖肉原是当地农村妇女烹制的家常菜。

sentences.en: Pork gazed at it reverently and slowly delight spread over his face.
sentences.cn: 波克怀着愉快的心情看着这只表,脸上慢慢显出十分崇敬的神色.

sentences.en: Pork is also the most versatile of meats. It can be roasted whole or in pieces.
sentences.cn: 在肉类中，猪肉的做法也是最多的，可以整块烤来吃，也可以切片烤来吃。

sentences.en: Pork set up an outcry which she found infuriating.
sentences.cn: 波克令人生气地大喝了一声.

sentences.en: Stir the pork about until it turns white all the way through.
sentences.cn: 不停搅动猪肉，直到它全部变白为止。

sentences.en: Though he had only one leg, he could work faster than Pork.
sentences.cn: 尽管他只有一条腿, 他却干得比波克还快.

phrases.tran_cn: 放猪肉的桶；（为讨好或报答支持者的）政治拨款
排骨；肋骨；猪肋排；叉烧排骨

trans.tran_cn: 猪肉，〈美俚〉支持政党上台所分到的好处，政治分肥，〈古〉猪
